entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Threading.RateLimiting.DefaultPartitionedRateLimiter cache invalidation bug #95611
  • Replacing runtime framework assembly works in C# but not in C++/CLI #95607
  • Current EventPipe asserts on StackFrameIterator when collecting tracing from nativeAOT apps #95606
    9.0.0
  • Upgrade to .NET 9 SDK #95605
  • Cookie expiration uses local time instead of UTC #95603
  • Test failure: System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests with libraries pgo and random osr stress #95600
    9.0.0
  • Current EventPipe asserts on StackFrameIterator when collecting gcdumps from nativeAOT apps #95599
    9.0.0
  • [Windows] Only load imported DLLs from System32 #95598
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization, invalid `TimeOnly` #95594
  • Mono's Vector128 support incorrectly handles Abs for signed integer MinValue #95592
    8.0.x
  • [MulticoreJIT] Writes to StartupProfileData-Interactive are syscall intensive #95591
  • XmlBaseWriter async operations #95586
  • CA2017 reports Logging has wrong number of arguments #95584
    Future
  • Unable to get Entire Certificate Chain in SSL Communication when creating a c++ Socket client using openSSL. #95578
  • Keyed services are not being returend by GetServices<T> #95576
  • iOS NativeAOT crash #95574
  • [OCSP Stapling] OSCP Reponse has expired in .NET7 Linux #95567
    7.0.x
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 6.0 January servicing SDK installed, the WindowsDesktop runtime should be display as "6.0.26" not "6.0.25". #95566
  • Building runtime on Visual Studio fails with compilation errors #95564
  • [API Proposal]: Linq method for getting value and index #95563

Closed

  • Method changes behaviour after optimisation #95394
    9.0.0
  • PGO Instrumented SDK fails to load coreclr.dll #95534
  • ReferenceEquals returns true for two objects with the same value in a different memory location. #95573
  • Complex options validation and the OptionsValidator #94173
    9.0.0
  • Significant allocations writing F# types using Console.Logger #95575
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE for SslStream on Windows #94843
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TraceEventDispatcher.ProcessAsync #95562
  • Test failure _ParallelCrashTester::ParallelCrashTester.ParallelCrashWorkerThreads() #94687
  • forgotten backport bugfix? #95508

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Suppress export name minification #95613
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Do not consider InUse registers for assigning to consecutive candidates #95612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Test upgrading to ICU 72.3 #95610
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • Use a more performant way to get the current thread id #95609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Limit optSwitchConvert to TYP_INT/TYP_LONG #95608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix mono-aot-cross .pdb file name #95604
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix whitespace issues to comply with code style #95602
    area-Meta
  • Consuming the return type instead of an interface #95601
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix Scalar.Abs for TInteger.MinValue #95597
    community-contribution, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • SslStream encryption buffer allocation improvements #95595
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove GT_STORE_DYN_BLK #95593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Port VN and loop hoisting to new loop representation #95589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: fix issue with out of order importer spilling around some calls #95587
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95582
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #95571
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • Fix generating debug info for static fields #95570
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix typo #95569
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • Updating Sum() implementation. #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Added ARM64 SVE_GA_2A encoding #95435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update test runs to use Alpine 3.16 #95373
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix GC regions virtual alloc after #80295 #95526
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adjust clr-abi for new arm32 call-finally behavior #95596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32" #95540
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Do not ignore coreclr.dll load failure in hostpolicy.dll #95538
    area-Host
  • Stop "crossblocklocalassertionprop" experiment. #95572
    needs-area-label
  • Fix Options extending System types cases in Options source generator #95560
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Fix NativeFormatGen.csproj build and code style issues #95585
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch HostApiInvokerApp to pre-built test asset #95521
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • JIT: fix issue with out of order importer spilling around some calls #95539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CL_3A to IF_SVE_CU_3A #95514
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Build dominator tree sibling links in RPO #95550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Check for reachable preds in RBO #95556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross (take 2) #95577
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Replace rsGetRsvdReg with ordinary temp registers #95317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Consolidate wasi/wasm build bits #95535
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [XUnitLogChecker] Fix condition that sets env variables for libraries runner scripts #95533
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross #95505
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Make isRemovableJmpCandidate less restrictive on AMD64 #95493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • Always unroll GT_STORE_BLK for blocks with gc refs on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    area-System.Runtime
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Port loop cloning to the new loop representation #95326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [Mono][WIP] Try not fall back to interpreter for runtime invoke #95469
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono][interp] Optimize ves_pinvoke_method () on wasm. #95545
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasm in release build #95502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish #95496
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some outdated helpers in libraries/Common #95515
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Enable activation injection for unix #95555
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • for macOS arm or in general use the installer or unpack via tar - instructions are confusing and issues are present #37306
  • PublishAot failed with LNK1181 error #37297

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't copy MSBuild to Container outputs #37315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable parallel copy in PublishDotnetWatchToRedist #37312
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correct emsdk Version.Details.xml sha #37305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #37299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid copying containerize to SDK root #37316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Minimize and update MSBuild in dotnet-watch #37310
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2329068 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Tools, 8.0.2xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExtractMethod and VerifyTextSync failing on latest scouting queue updated to 17.9 P1 #71088
    17.9 P3
  • Upgrade to .NET 9 SDK #71084
  • Problem with references not being shown correctly. #71079
  • Features currently not available - the issue still exists in Version 17.7.6 of Visual Studio Professional 2022 #71076
  • Symbol loading issue in Visual Studio: 'Go to Definition' in solution with solution filters only opens metadata of class #71074
  • SourceLink tab intercepts input of C# interactive window #71073
    Backlog
  • C# interactive doesn't use the newest language version #71072
    Backlog
  • Framework assemblies confliction in C# Interactive window #71071
    Backlog
  • 'nameof(Method)' should not appear in "Calls to 'Method'" in Call Hierarchy #71068

Closed

  • TextDocument.Folders is always empty for additional files #65589
    17.9 P2
  • CS8166 when returning a primary constructor parameter by ref #71011
  • Null parameters C# 12 (.net 8) Primary Constructors #71083
  • Unable to jump to the implementation of a source generated fille #71075

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable ExtractMethod and VerifyTextSync after 17.9P1 failures #71089
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Upgrade versions #71087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add IVT from EA.Razor to MS.ANC.Razor.Test.Common.Tooling #71086
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Still offer 'use collection expression' when tehre is a tuple name mismatch in the code. #71085
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid leaking text views on cancellation #71081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix Code Actions not applied when LSP editor is enabled #71077
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update MSBuild ref dependency #71069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pass through folders for additional files #71061
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Give our analyzer loaders independent directories across hosts #71070
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #69761
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Insert release/dev17.9 to rel branch #71057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add comments to the nuget search update system. #71078
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost" #71082
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update publishdata after VS 17.9 p2 snap #71080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow ms time sums to be long instead of just int. #71060
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Offer use-primary-constructor on abtract types with protected constructors #71053
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update TFM for BuildHost in source build #71035
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #71091
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #71090
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Prioritize Obsolete attribute over siblings #71043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community, Backlog
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Cancel the request to copilot when typing start #71055
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit `readonly.` for constrained array access #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add MapMethods with RoutePattern #52581
  • Empty cookies are missing from HttpRequest.Cookies #52580
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Doesn't Handle Media Type Subsets #52577
  • Perf regression: json #52576
  • Cannot use Bearer Token in new asp.net core identity API #52574
  • Quarantine POST_MultipleRequests_PooledStreamAndHeaders #52573
    Test failures
  • Request not being aborted after closing the connection is causing high CPU #52564
  • Data protection: Duplicate keys created in key ring #52561
  • Perf regression: json #52558
  • Slowness on the Clint End | Memory spike in the Chrome browser #52557
  • Analyzer: ASP0022 and ASP0023 Report False Positives for Versioned Routes #52556

Closed

  • SupplyParameterFromQuery should work in (non routable) components and two-way #41963
    Planning: WebUI
  • E2E tests ignore javascript errors #41607
    Planning: WebUI
  • @onclick not invoked on <a> tags when in disabled fieldset #47090
    Planning: WebUI
  • Build fails on Mac M1 with "ENOENT: no such file or directory" due to selenium-standalone #45838
    Planning: WebUI
  • Workaround for challenging certain authentication schemes without HttpContext #36030
    Planning: WebUI
  • Or it should be like this #52578
  • Add CancellationToken injection support #52570
  • PreventDefault And StopPropgration In Event #52544
  • Allow defining Blazor component parameters at runtime #52204
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #52458
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #52542
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #52546
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #52554

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52559
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Quarantine POST_MultipleRequests_PooledStreamAndHeaders #52575
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • rev SDK to current nightly (build-ops) #52568
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • HeaderDictionaryTypeExtensions not using Dictionary #52551
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #52523
    area-signalr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade to .NET 9 SDK #4421

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changing MainPage of a Maui app breaks OnBackPressedDispatcher callback #19203
  • Border Stoke data binding does not work #19201
  • Splash screen no longer working in .Net 8 Maui #19200
  • AdaptiveTrigger does not work #19197
  • VerticalScrollBar not visible until hovered #19196
  • .NET 8 first item in CollectionView larger than rest #19195
  • When making minor changes to a xaml file, after saving and running on Windows Machine a unhandled exception happens. When changing back (ctrl-z) it doesn't fix it. #19193
  • Allow to set a custom MauiWinUIWindow #19192
  • Picker TitleColor not working on iOS #19191
  • Setting a style on a label causes spans with FontAttributes to be ignored on Android #19190
  • Images in html from assets displaying in WebView are not displayed on Android and iOS #19189
    Backlog
  • WebView Scale out of screen #19188
  • ListView GroupHeaderTemplate produces blank headers on iOS #19186
    Backlog
  • [build] Remove GitInfo #19185
    Backlog
  • Use System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlDecode instead of System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode #19183

Closed

  • Unable to run MAUI app on physical iOS device #19202
  • ERROR WHILE COMPLETING THE .NET MUAI #19034
  • Bitmap accumulates until OutOfMemory exception #18894
  • GraphcView: Draw method of Drawable constantly fires #19009
  • WebView in android forget user login credentials every app restart #19010
  • Pinch And Pan Gesture not Working Properly #19028
  • Unreliable Connection to Mac from Windows #19153
  • VersionTracking only return 1.0.0.1 on Windows platform #19179
  • Can't compile on Mac #19039
  • Random crashes on iOS when navigating #18153
    Backlog
  • SQLite db crash the app in .net8 #19173

PullRequests

Created

  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 SR2
  • NativeAOT: Add integration tests for testing MAUI compatibility with NativeAOT on iOS #19194
    community ✨
  • [testing] Increase timeout for device tests #19184
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Add SetSliderValue method to UITest #19182
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-slider, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Add scroll methods to UITest #19181
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test

Merged

  • Update ShellSectionRenderer.cs #18945
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #19145
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19169
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Add PressVolumeUp and PressVolumeDown methods to UITest #19131
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Flyout Header breaking clicking over items #19125
  • [Windows] Fix setting flyout width (#19068) #19070
    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added lifecycle methods to UITest #19102
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    area/FlyoutPage, community ✨
  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Correct nullable annotations on IMediaPicker #19157
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞
  • Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, legacy-ui-test
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bind navigation property from many-to-many to entity directly #32516
  • Query: primitive collection parameters values should reflect the type they are representing #32515
  • How do I create an optional 1:1 relationship in EF Core where neither side is dependent on the other? #32514
  • NullReferenceException when configuring ToJson() twice #32513
  • SQLite Error 5: 'not an error' #32512
  • Having navigations for base type and sub type in the same entity result in "Cannot create a relationship ... because a relationship already exists..." exception #32507
  • SelectMany over primitive collection property fails #32505
  • Support for mapping single property to multiple database columns #32503
  • Error selecting nested json collections with query splitting on #32502

Closed

  • Regression? "The object has been removed from the model" on SQLite complex objects #32472
  • Neither SaveChanges nor EntityEntry.ReloadAsync include navigation properties with AutoInclude. #32408
  • translate `Nullable<T>.GetValueOrDefault()` with `IsNull()` #32471
  • Query: Translate GetValueOrDefault over DateTime #19266

PullRequests

Created

  • Automatic use of C# primary constructors #32509
  • Refactor queryable collection support for non-relational providers #32506
  • [release/8.0] Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32504

Merged

  • Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32478
  • Infer type mapping suitable for concatenating two results #32510
  • Attempt to reduce flakiness in ExecuteReader_throws_when_busy tests #32501

Updated

  • Update Grpc.AspNetCore #32500
    blocked
  • Handle updating complex type properties in ExecuteUpdate #32499

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade the SDK after creating and running projects, the SDK was installed SxS not upgraded. #17907

PullRequests

Merged
